titles.title: Department of Homeland Security Classified Facility Inventory Act
Department of Homeland Security Classified Facility Inventory Act
To require an inventory of all facilities certified by the Department of Homeland Security to host infrastructure or systems classified above the Secret level, and for other purposes.
Department of Homeland Security Classified Facility Inventory Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Counterterrorism and Intelligence.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
